# =========================
# Visual Studio / .NET
# =========================

## Build results
bin/
obj/

## User-specific files
*.user
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

## Visual Studio cache
.vs/

## Debug / Release folders
Debug/
Release/
x64/
x86/
AnyCPU/

## Rider / VS Code
.idea/
.vscode/

## Logs
*.log

## OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

## NuGet packages (optional)
# packages/

## Test results
TestResults/

## Coverage results
coverage/
coverage.xml

## Publish output
publish/

## Environment files
*.env

## Backup & temp files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp

## Database files (local)
*.mdf
*.ldf

## Resharper
_ReSharper*/
